game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the lost treasure from the ancient ruins.
game.description: In the depths of the forbidden forest lies the ancient ruins of a long-lost civilization. Legends say that within these ruins lies a treasure of unimaginable riches. Embark on a quest to retrieve the lost treasure and become the stuff of legends.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Navigate through the dense forest and find the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins.

task.objective: Solve the puzzles within the ruins
task.description: Decode the ancient hieroglyphics, solve intricate puzzles, and avoid deadly traps within the ruins.

task.objective: Retrieve the treasure from the chamber
task.description: Locate the chamber where the treasure is hidden and overcome any obstacles in your path to claim it.
